en.title:
Mighty Aries
<size=36>and the</size>
Movement of Energy
en.credits_music:
Music and Sound by Winfield B. Carson V

Singer Katya Hall
en.intro_1: This world looks rather gloomy…we ought to brighten things up!
en.intro_2: Well, for that to happen we need the mighty Aries…who is currently asleep over there.
en.intro_3: In order to wake him up, we’re going to need to give him some energy!
en.intro_4: Energy provides us the power to act, and the ability to change. Though Aries is a bundle of energy, he is currently at rest.
en.intro_5: It looks like it’s up to you to take action! With your own energy, help the mighty Aries bring light to this world!
en.level_1_intro_0: Energy comes in many forms, and they have ways of moving about.
en.level_1_intro_2: Light is an energy made up of waves. Among many things, it can provide heat.
en.level_1_intro_3: Think of the sun as the biggest source of light energy, bringing sustenance to most living things.
en.level_1_play_intro_0: Here we have a spirit that provides light energy.
en.level_1_play_intro_1: In order for its light energy to move, we’ll need to rotate these contraptions.
en.level_1_instruction_0: Simply move the contraption like so!
en.level_1_outer_complete_0: Great! Now just one more, and the light shall shine through!
en.level_1_inner_complete_0: Excellent! Now that the light energy is free, why don’t we check back with the mighty Aries!
en.level_1_victory_1_0: As the warm light embraces Aries’s body, he begins to wake up!
en.level_1_victory_2_0: Thanks to your efforts, Aries is now full of energy!
en.level_1_victory_3_0: Now the mighty Aries can go forth to brighten up this world!
en.level_1_victory_3_1: Let’s help him out further by learning more about energy movements!
en.level_2_intro_0: Now we’ll be learning how to move light energy from one place to another.
en.level_2_intro_1: One neat thing about light is that it can bounce off of reflective surfaces like gems or mirrors.
en.level_2_goal_1_intro_0: Our task is to redirect the light energy towards this bell.
en.level_2_gem_intro_0: This gem here will bounce the light energy to where it points.
en.level_2_gem_instruct_0: Go ahead and place the gem into the indicated slot.
en.level_2_gem_instruct_1: Simply press the gem, and drag it into the slot as shown.
en.level_2_gem_placed_0: Excellent! As you can see, the light energy is bouncing off of the gem towards a direction.
en.level_2_gem_next_0: Now on to the next gem! Just like before, drag the object towards the indicated slot.
en.level_2_gem_next_placed_0: We’re almost there. Now we just need to adjust the direction of the light towards the bell.
en.level_2_slot_instruct_0: All you need to do is press and drag the lever to rotate the slot.
en.level_2_goal_1_reached_0: Excellent! Can you hear that? The bell is ringing joyously!
en.level_2_goal_1_reached_1: Due to the light, the bell is able to vibrate causing it to make another type of energy: sound.
en.level_2_goal_1_reached_2: As you can see, we are able to change from one energy into another. From light to sound energy.
en.level_2_goal_1_reached_3: But of course, none of this is possible without your actions. Your own energy is what brings these to life!
en.level_2_next_task_0: Now to power up the remaining bell!
en.level_2_next_task_1: Just like before, place the gems into the slots, and redirect the light energy towards the bell.
en.level_3_intro_0: Now that we’ve seen energy as light, let’s take a look at energy as motion.
en.level_3_intro_1: Moving objects contain energy. When it hits another object, that energy is transferred.
en.level_3_intro_2: This is called energy of motion, also known as: kinetic energy.
en.level_3_plunger_instruct_0: Let’s go check out how this energy of motion works!
en.level_3_plunger_instruct_1: Pulling this spring plunger will allow it to push the rock.
en.level_3_plunger_instruct_2: The further left you drag the handle, the more push it will give.
en.level_3_push_platform_point_0: Try to have the rock hit this platform. Remember to pull the spring plunger as far back as you can!
en.level_3_task_first_complete_0: Nicely done! As you can see, the energy of motion moved from one object to another.
en.level_3_task_first_complete_1: The energy released from the spring plunger has caused a series of movement, from one rock to another.
en.level_3_goal_pointers_0: Now let’s see if you can ring these other bells!
en.level_3_rotate_pointer_0: Let me adjust this so that it can hit the second platform!
en.level_3_slider_pointer_0: You’re going to need to adjust the position of this rock in order to hit both bells.
en.level_3_go_0: Well, it’s all up to you now! Good luck!
en.level_4_intro_0: Now we are going to look at another way to achieve energy from motion.
en.level_4_water_0: Here we have a spirit that provides us an everlasting flow of water.
en.level_4_water_1: The water’s motion will allow objects it touches to continuously move, thus providing a constant flow of energy.
en.level_4_switch_instruct_0: Press these two switches to divert the water’s flow towards the bell.
en.level_4_goal_thing_0: Excellent! So long as there’s water flowing, the bell will continue to ring.
en.level_4_goal_other_pointers_0: Now why don’t you go ahead and let the water flow towards the other bells!
en.level_5_intro_0: Here we are near the end of our journey!
en.level_5_intro_1: For this one, we will be powering up the bells with electricity.
en.level_5_intro_2: Electricity is a kind of energy that can move through conductive materials like metal.
en.level_5_intro_3: In this case, we are using copper wires.
en.level_5_turbine_intro_0: This is a turbine, a kind of machine that generates electrical energy by spinning magnets.
en.level_5_turbine_intro_1: In order to power the turbine, we will need lots of energy to move its blades.
en.level_5_water_intro_0: One way to do that is through steam from boiling water.
en.level_5_water_intro_1: By concentrating the steam through a narrow pipe, its energy will be strong enough to power the turbine.
en.level_5_fire_intro_0: Now in order to boil water, we will need energy to heat it up.
en.level_5_fire_intro_1: That’s where fire comes in. Fire releases energy that heats things up, also known as: thermal energy.
en.level_5_coal_intro_0: But in order to keep the fire going, we will need to feed it fuel.
en.level_5_coal_intro_1: Well, that’s what these coals are for. Coals provide fire with the energy to release heat.
en.level_5_electric_explain_0: Whew! That’s a lot of energy movement from one thing to another!
en.level_5_electric_explain_1: Now you’re wondering why go through all this trouble?
en.level_5_electric_explain_2: Well, electrical energy is really easy to move at a long distance. Think of the electrical poles around your home.
en.level_5_electric_explain_3: All that electricity comes from a place far away so it can have enough space to generate lots of energy!
en.level_5_coal_interact_0: Anyhow, let’s turn up the heat!
en.level_5_coal_interact_1: Go ahead and press the lever to feed the fire.
en.level_5_power_first_active_0: Nice! Here you see the whole process of energy moving from one thing to the next, and finally transforming into electricity.
en.level_5_power_connect_instruct_0: Now let’s power up that bell by attaching the power line into the socket.
en.level_5_power_connect_instruct_1: Simply drag the power plug into the socket as shown.
en.level_5_goal_first_active_0: Excellent! Now we just need to power up the rest of the bells!
en.level_5_goal_first_active_1: Though you may have noticed that only one of the power lines were able to receive electricity.
en.level_5_goal_first_active_2: Well, we’ll just have to fan the flame to make it release more heat!
en.level_5_wind_intro_0: We need to feed the fire with more oxygen so that it can burn through the coal faster, and produce more heat.
en.level_5_wind_intro_1: With more heat, the water will produce more steam, allowing it to turn the turbine’s fan faster.
en.level_5_wind_instruct_0: Simply press the wind fella multiple times until all the power lines are fully charged with electricity.
en.level_5_power_connect_all_0: Excellent! With the turbine fully powered, you can now plug in the rest of the power lines.
en.level_5_power_connect_all_1: Just like before, simply drag the power plug into one of the sockets that connects to the bell.
en.level_5_power_connect_all_2: Also remember to keep the fire well fed with coal and oxygen!
en.level_5_end_0: Nicely done! With all the bells ringing, we have reached the end of our journey.
en.level_5_end_1: This concludes our lesson for energy movement!
en.level_5_end_2: Now go forth, and bring energy into the real world!
